extension_name.message: Saladict, i-Msebenzi-Otyebileyo Kumgca Umguquleli. Ye-Chrome / I-Firefox I-Extension.

extension_description.message: Saladict yi elinolwazi ilizwi-uguqulelo ulwandiso, wadalelwa emnqamlezweni-ukufunda. Ke enkulu inani authoritative isichazi-magama ichaphazela isingesi, isifrentshi, Isijapanese, kwaye isispanish, kwaye inkxaso complex ilizwi ukuqhubela, iphepha le web-lwimi, ilizwi iincwadi, kwaye PDF yokukhangela.

command_open_quick_search.message: Vula okanye yenza uphawu standalone dict yolawulo
